title: Continent Profile Template
description: Defines a continent's shape, position, plate boundaries, water bodies, and the sovereign powers that occupy it. Even continents not used in detail should have at least a name, hemisphere, and basic sovereign powers documented.

approximate_size.description: Approximate size, ideally compared to an Earth continent (e.g., 'roughly the size of Europe')

latitude_range.description: Approximate latitude range (distance from equator) affecting climate

shape_description.description: Description of the continent's overall shape and coastline

location.description: Where on the continent this boundary is located

resulting_features.description: What geographic features result (coastal mountains with volcanoes, tallest mountains, volcanic islands, earthquakes)

plate_boundaries.description: Tectonic plate boundaries affecting this continent

water_bodies.description: Major water bodies (oceans, seas, bays, straits) surrounding or within this continent

major_islands.description: Major islands associated with this continent

sovereign_powers.description: Sovereign powers that occupy territory on this continent

other_continents.description: Other continents with significant relationships to this one

reputation.description: What is this continent known for from an outsider's perspective (naval power, slave trade, exotic goods, etc.)

tectonic_activity.description: Notes on earthquake and volcanic activity

continental_shelf_notes.description: Where the continental shelf is deep or shallow, and implications for sea travel and creatures

detail_level.description: How much detail this continent receives: primary (fully developed), secondary (partially developed), background (name and basic notes only)

x-cross-references.planet-profile: This continent exists on a planet defined in the Planet Profile
x-cross-references.water-body-reference: Water bodies around this continent are defined in Water Body References
x-cross-references.land-feature-catalog: Land features on this continent are defined in Land Feature Catalogs
x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: Sovereign powers on this continent are defined in Sovereign Power Profiles
x-cross-references.climate-zone-reference: Climate zones on this continent are determined by latitude and the Climate Zone Reference
